subject: feat: implement join chat link share functionality with deep linking support
body:
- Add utils/sharing.ts with generateChatJoinLink() and shareChatLink()
- Update create.tsx with "Share Link" button (primary) and "Copy Code" (secondary)
- Add dynamic route app/(app)/join/[code].tsx for link-based joining
- Move join.tsx to join/index.tsx to support nested routing
- Add deep link handler in app/_layout.tsx using expo-linking
- Support both web URLs (https://synctone.vercel.app/join/{code}) and native URLs (myapp://join/{code})
- Update CLAUDE.md and README.md with link sharing documentation
- Update docs/TODO.md and docs/HISTORY.md

Users can now share chat invites via SMS, WhatsApp, email, or any app with a single tap.
Recipients click the link and join without typing codes. Links work universally across
web and native platforms with deep linking support for seamless native app experience.
title: implement join chat link share functionality with deep linking support
